Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Associate Editor per August 2011- current: Bulletin of Economic Research June 2013 – current: Journal of Time Series Analysis

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Partecipazione a convegni di carattere scientifico 2015: 6th ICEEE, Salerno, 21-23 January. 2013: 7th Conference in Computational and Financial Econometrics (London), 14-16 December. 2012: Conference in honor of PCB Phillips, York, 12 and 13 July. 2009: York Econometrics workshop, 11 May; 64th Econometric Society European Meeting (Barcelona), 23-28 August; 3rd Annual conference Recent developments in Time Series Analysis, Nottingham, 14-15 Sept. 2008: 2nd International Workshop on Computational and Financial Econometrics (Neuchâtel), 19-21 June; 2006: Financial Econometrics, York, 2 and 3 June; Break and Persistence in econometrics, Cass 11-12 December; 2007: 62nd Econometric Society European Meeting (Budapest), 27-31 August; 2005: ICEEE-Italian Congress in Econometrics and Empirical Economics, Venice, 24 and 25 January; 2003: Strategy on EMU Enlargement, Varsavia, 12 Dicembre.

Invited Seminars 2016: University of York - Mathematics [20 May]; Universita’ di Bologna [30 May] 2015: University of Lund [6 March]; University of Nottingham [19 March]; Università Statale del Piemonte Orientale (Novara) [28 May]. 2010: Università Commerciale L. Bocconi Milano; 2009: Brunel University, Università Statale di Cagliari; 2008: Queen Mary University of London, Royal Holloway University of London 2007: Università Statale di Salerno; University of Nottingham; 2006: Università Statale di Milano; 2005: Queen Mary University of London, City University, Birkbeck College, Georgia State University, University of York, Università Statale di Bologna;
Organizzazione di convegni di carattere scientifico 2012 5th York Econometrics Symposium (Conference in honor of PCB Phillips, York, 12 and 13 July) 2008 3rd York Econometrics Symposium (York)

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Supervisione di studenti di dottorato University of York Primary supervisor Fabio Profumo (dal 2016) (in collaborazione con Laura Coroneo) Titolo tesi: Heteroskedasticity and Autocorrelation Robust Forecast Evaluation.
Thesis Advisory Group member for: Liquiong Wang (Awarded 1 July 2011) Francesco Mariotti (Awarded 4 April 2011) Derya Filiz Unsal (Awarded 6 Nov 2009) Federico Crudu (Awarded 15 Sept 2009)

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Ho partecipato da Ricercatore al gruppo di ricerca Ezoneplus (The Eastwards Enlargement of the Eurozone) (http://www.ezoneplus.org) per 24 mesi (2003-2004). Il Gruppo di ricerca includeva istitituzioni ed universita' da Germania, Estonia, Finlandia, Italia, Polonia, Portogallo e Slovenia. La mia partecipazione e' stata finanziata con una Research Fellowship dall'Universita' di Bologna.

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Referee Activity per Journal of Econometrics (11) Journal of Time Series Analysis (23) Econometric Theory (7) Annals of Statistics (1) Oxford Bulletin of Economics and Statistics (2) Computational Statistics and Data Analysis (3) Bulletin of Economic Research (14) Econometrics Journal (2) IMA Journal of Management Mathematics (1) Statistical Inference for Stochastic Processes (2) Journal of Empirical Finance (2) Metroeconomica (2) Value in Health (2) Applied Economics (1) Journal of Multivariate Analysis (1) American Journal of Agricultural Economics (1) Econometrics and Statistics (1) Econometrics (1) Econometrics Review (1) Economics Letters (1) International Journal of Monetary Economics and Finance (1)

Forthcoming papers “Fixed bandwidth asymptotics for the studentized mean of fractionally integrated processes”, 2017, with J. Hualde, Economics Letters 150, 39–43. http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.econlet.2016.10.014 “Testing for a change in mean under fractional integration”, 2017, with S. Leybourne and AM R Taylor, Journal of Time Series Econometrics, forthcoming, DOI 10.1515/jtse-2015-0006 .

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Insegnamento presso London School of Economics e presso University of York 2016 - current UoY: Module Leader for Time Series and Financial Econometrics (BSc) 2013 – current UoY: Module Leader for Probability 1 (BSc) 2009 – 2016 UoY: Module Leader for Financial Econometrics (BSc) 2008 - 2016 UoY: Module Leader for Introduction to Time Series (BSc) 2008 - 2013 UoY: Module Leader for Introduction to Statistical Theory (BSc) 2007 - current UoY: Module Leader for Statistics Review (MSc). 2005 - 2008 UoY: Module Leader for Time Series 1 (MSc) 2005 - 2008 UoY: Module Leader for Advanced Econometrics (MSc) 2004 - 2006 LSE/ELSE Lecturer in Economics. 2003 - 2005 LSE: class teacher in EC443 Advanced Econometrics (MRes/PhD). 2003 - 2004 LSE: class teacher in EC402 Methods of Economic Investigation (MSc). 2001 - 2003 LSE: class teacher in Summer School Introduction to Econometrics EC212 (BSc). 2001 - 2003 LSE: class teacher in Principles of Econometrics EC221 (BSc). 1999 - 2001 LSE: class teacher Preliminary course of Statistics EC401 (BSc). 1999 - 2001 LSE: class teacher in Introduction to Econometrics EC220 (BSc).
